steps.title: Here are some numbers you can type in to make words
steps.content: Here are some numbers you can type in to make words 707 = LOL 0.0Z = ZOO 0.1134 = HELLO 3105 = SOLE 14 = HI

steps.title: Press on the screen where the numbers are (not too hard).
steps.content: Press on the screen where the numbers are (not too hard).

steps.title: Have multiple people with a calculator or you may choose play by yourself.
steps.content: Have multiple people with a calculator or you may choose play by yourself.

steps.title: Press key 1.
steps.content: Press key 1. Then, press the addition sign, which looks like this: + .

steps.title: Press 1 again and then press the equal sign:
steps.content: Press 1 again and then press the equal sign: = .

steps.title: Set a limit on the number you wish to stop to.
steps.content: Set a limit on the number you wish to stop to. Say you wish to play until 1,000. Everyone or yourself keeps pressing the equal key on the calculator until they or you have reached to 1,000. The one who gets to 1,000, or the number you decide, first wins the game!
